overview:
As Vice President and Managing Director of Asia-Pacific & Latin America for AdMob, Jeff is responsible for the company’s strategy, operations and expansion across Asia-Pacific and Latin America.

Prior to joining AdMob, Jeff was Director of Market Development for Motorola where he was responsible for sell in, commercialization, and marketing of media solutions and services (including SCREEN3) to operators and retail markets globally. Previously, Jeff was a marketing manager at Apple Computer, a business development manager for a wireless payment startup in Singapore and a management consultant for Price Waterhouse in United States and in Europe. Jeff holds BA from Taylor University and an MBA from the Stanford Graduate School of Business.

relationships.title: VP & MD, Asia Pacific & Latin America
